description: Removes specified tags from an OpsWorks CM server or backup.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of a resource from which you want to remove tags. For example, arn:aws:opsworks-cm:us-west-2:123456789012:server/test-owcm-server/EXAMPLE-66b0-4196-8274-d1a2bEXAMPLE.

parameters.name: TagKeys
parameters.description: The keys of tags that you want to remove. (string) ---
